title: 2024 Easter Recipe Guide! 50 Of the Best Easter Recipes!

excerpt: Today I'm sharing the best of the best easter recipes with 50 of my favorite dishes for the holiday. Appetizers and snacks, brunch and dinner, finished off with cocktails and dessert!
text: Today I’m sharing the best of the best easter recipes with 50 of my favorite dishes for the holiday. Appetizers and snacks, brunch and dinner, finished off with cocktails and dessert! Time to put together a fabulous menu for the holiday! And I still have a lot of great Easter recipes coming to you in the next few weeks, but in the meantime, figured you could get the ball rolling with your menu. The dishes at Easter are not my favorite – I’m not a huge fan of ham. So because of that, over the years I’ve come up with tons of delish plates that I DO love at Easter. Whether it’s brunch, dinner, dessert- I’ve got you covered! P.S. While you’re at it, you can dye eggs with cool whip and they will look like tie dye unicorn eggs. Fun! Are you an Easter brunch or dinner person? I’m kind of… both. And chocolate peanut butter eggs, always. 50 of the Best Easter Recipes Grilled Asparagus Caesar Green Goddess Roasted Carrot Salad Asparagus Souffle Frittata Ham & Swiss Puff Pastry Asparagus Stuffed Chicken with Smashed Potatoes French Onion Deviled Eggs Pimento Cheese Deviled Eggs Bacon Blue Deviled Eggs with Roasted Asparagus Smoked Salmon Everything Deviled Eggs Everything Smoked Salmon Dip Melon Mosaic Salad with Hot Honey Vinaigrette Strawberry Crunch Salad Lemon Risotto with Asparagus Burst Tomato Goat Cheese Prosciutto Quiche Broccoli Cheddar Quiche Asparagus Hash Brown Quiche Pimento Cheese Quiche Grilled Peppers with Burrata and Breadcrumbs Cream of Asparagus Soup Easter Brunch Board Spring Nicoise Salad Spring Pasta Salad with Honey Mustard Dressing Asparagus Potato Salad with Hot Bacon Dressing Smoked Salmon Tartines with Green Goddess Goat Cheese French Onion Scalloped Potatoes Asiago Scalloped Potatoes How Sweet Eats House Mashed Potatoes Bacon Wrapped Caramelized Sesame Asparagus Brown Butter Hasselback Potatoes Roasted Asparagus Croque Madame Bacon Roasted Carrots Shaved Asparagus with Soft Boiled Eggs Herb Brown Butter Scallops with Champagne Risotto Lobster Mac and Cheese Lavender White Wine Sangria Hummingbird Mimosas Strawberry Citrus Easter Punch Easter Bunny Snack Mix Chocolate Coconut Easter Cake Orange Cake with Coconut Frosting Giant Lavender Berry Pop Tart Pistachio Carrot Cake with Cream Cheese Icing Lemon Crumb Cake Carrot Cake Cinnamon Rolls with Mascarpone Icing Confetti Bunny Cake Lemon Almond Pudding Cake Carrot Cake Loaf with Nutella Swirl Frosting Lavender Cupcakes with Cream Cheese Frosting Peeps Skillet S’mores Banana Carrot Cupcakes Blueberry Ricotta Cake with Lavender Glaze Greek Yogurt Lemon Loaf Salted Citrus Bars Coconut Coffee Cake
html:
Today I’m sharing the best of the best easter recipes with 50 of my favorite dishes for the holiday. Appetizers and snacks, brunch and dinner, finished off with cocktails and dessert!

Time to put together a fabulous menu for the holiday!

And I still have a lot of great Easter recipes coming to you in the next few weeks, but in the meantime, figured you could get the ball rolling with your menu.

The dishes at Easter are not my favorite – I’m not a huge fan of ham. So because of that, over the years I’ve come up with tons of delish plates that I DO love at Easter. Whether it’s brunch, dinner, dessert- I’ve got you covered!

P.S. While you’re at it, you can dye eggs with cool whip and they will look like tie dye unicorn eggs. Fun!

Are you an Easter brunch or dinner person? I’m kind of… both. And chocolate peanut butter eggs, always.

50 of the Best Easter Recipes

Grilled Asparagus Caesar

Green Goddess Roasted Carrot Salad

Asparagus Souffle Frittata

Ham & Swiss Puff Pastry

Asparagus Stuffed Chicken with Smashed Potatoes

French Onion Deviled Eggs

Pimento Cheese Deviled Eggs

Bacon Blue Deviled Eggs with Roasted Asparagus

Smoked Salmon Everything Deviled Eggs

Everything Smoked Salmon Dip

Melon Mosaic Salad with Hot Honey Vinaigrette

Strawberry Crunch Salad

Lemon Risotto with Asparagus

Burst Tomato Goat Cheese Prosciutto Quiche

Broccoli Cheddar Quiche

Asparagus Hash Brown Quiche

Pimento Cheese Quiche

Grilled Peppers with Burrata and Breadcrumbs

Easter Brunch Board

Spring Nicoise Salad
